section.title: Creating Roles for Swift Nodes
section.para: To create roles for Swift nodes, you must edit the data/server_roles.yml file and add an entry to the server-roles list using the following syntax:
section.screen: server-roles: - name: PICK-A-NAME interface-model: SPECIFY-A-NAME disk-model: SPECIFY-A-NAME
section.para: The fields for server roles are defined as follows:

row.entry: Specifies a name assigned for the role. In the following example, SWOBJ-ROLE is the role name.
You can either select an existing interface model or create one specifically for Swift object servers. In the following example SWOBJ-INTERFACES is used. For more information, see .
You can either select an existing model or create one specifically for Swift object servers. In the following example SWOBJ-DISKS is used. For more information, see .

section.screen: server-roles: - name: SWOBJ-ROLE interface-model: SWOBJ-INTERFACES disk-model: SWOBJ-DISKS
